ALM Toolkit provides the following features: - Database Compare - Code Merging - Easy Deployments - Source-Control

value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI

value.title: Best Practice for Power BI Workspace Roles Setup
value.excerpt: Power BI workspaces are not like old days, that we had Edit access and View access anymore. In this video, I'll explain all the roles in the workspace,

value.title: CDS and CDM are Not the Same   Difference Explained

value.title: Day of Year and Day of Quarter   DAX calculations for Power BI

value.title: Find a Text Term in a Field in Power BI Using DAX Functions
value.excerpt: In Power BI, there are multiple ways of searching for a text term inside a text field, you can use Power Query for doing this operation or calculations in DAX.
